local
Class Create

java.lang.Object
  local.Create

public class Create
extends java.lang.Object

Creates vars to local paths (Fs.img_pfad , Fs.data_pfad) Depending on OS sets the right slashes (in a folder path)

Author:
Andreas Roth, Martin Knonsalla
